summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IMPAR survey platform MVP. Backend APIs working well (89.5% success rate), frontend UI functional with proper user flows. Core survey creation, publishing, and taking functionality verified.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 422 when submitting survey response - parameter format issue

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Different error code but still blocks access correctly

integration_issues.issue: Admin page not accessible even for owner role users
JWT tokens expire quickly, users get logged out frequently

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper IMPAR branding
User registration flow (first user becomes owner)
Survey creation page loads and form works
Multiple question types supported (multiple choice, text, rating)
Featured surveys appear on homepage and surveys list
Surveys list page with search functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin page routing issue - owner/admin users cannot access /admin page. Also investigate JWT token expiration settings for better user experience.
